name: Dungeon of Giants
description:
Dungeon of Giants is a 3D mobile platformer and maze game made with Unity. Collect all the keys, open the portal and escape! Don't let the monsters to catch you!

This game is our Mobile Game Development project with the mixture of 3D platformer and maze genres made with my friends who are Oytun Burak, Durukal Diker and Fatih Taner. It includes third person controller, basic AI movement and attack mechanics, collecting system to check if all items are taken to open portal and finish level, minimap, UI, etc. Mechanics are made for both PC and Android platform. 

How To Play

The game is played with single player. First, by pressing the "Play" button, game starts. Move button is placed on the left bottom of the screen, jump button is placed on the right bottom of the screen. Transparent light gray place of the screen is touch field where player can rotate the character by dragging it.
